title: FINAL PRICE DROP: 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamps - ARCHER and BARGER
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: FINAL PRICE DROP: 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamps - ARCHER and BARGER
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are the following 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamps:

Jimmy Archer - [STRIKE]$250[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$225[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$195[/STRIKE] Listed on eBay
Cy Barger (Partial "B") - SOLD

The Archer has a slight amount of paper loss on his nose and on the back of the stamp.  The Barger has a horizontal wrinkle, a tear at the bottom, and more material paper loss on the back.  Both are RARE.  See scans for condition.

PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested in either/both.

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Archer%2025%20_extra%204_.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Archer%2025%20_extra%204_%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Barger%20Partial%20B%2025%20_extra%202_.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Barger%20Partial%20B%2025%20_extra%202_%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]
bump for price reduction on Archer.
